Articles.Content: Floor 207: You open the door, and it appears you have entered a concert. You're on the stage.
Floor 208: North Korea's nuclear weapon stockpile
Floor 209: A guy watching inside a tiny hole in the floor. Must be a CIA agent watching North Korea's nuclear weapon stockpile
Floor 210: An MI6 guy, watching the CIA guy watch the nuclear warheads through a hole in the ground, through a hole in the ground.
Floor 211: A huge lab wÃ„Â±th many computers and an SRB wÃ„Â±th Jeb on Ã„Â±t
Floor 212: Castle Aincrad, crumbling to ruins.
Floor 213: a computer with elevator source running
Floor 214 (Floor ???? from Milky Way): Suddenly, the spacescraper lost the ability of measuring the distances. The damn Quantum teleporter failed miserably.
Floor 215: Suddenly, the spacescraper teleported you to the surface of the Moon.
Floor 216 (???? From Center of Milky Way): Once again the defected teleported you way away from the Sun. You are now on your own. Somehow, you feel a strong gravitational pull.
Floor 217 (Floor ???? from Milky Way): It appears that Jupiter (planet) was teleported with you!
Floor 218: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a Grue.
Floor 219 (???? from the center of Milky Way): You feel a stronger gravity force, greater than the neutron star. The figure is getting much darker than last time. It is emitting something, too!
Floor 219 (???? from the center of Milky Way): You decide to repair the quantum teleporter, but ultimately fail to do so; it manages to teleport you to the Andromeda galaxy
Floor 220 (???? from the center of the Milky Way): You find 220 different Pokemon from failing to repair the teleporter.
Floor 221: You see Jeb bragging about how he's going to make his OWN Space Shuttle! With blackjack! And hookers!

Floor 222: Space.

My god, it's full of stars...

Floor 223: (??? From the center of the Milky Way): Somehow that quantum teleporter acted up again, teleporting the section of the building you're in (along with all floors above you) into the center of a red giant, seem safe!
Floor 224: (??? From the center of the Milky Way) It just so happens, it is a full 1:1 scale model of the first floor

Floor 225 (Estimated 500 from the center of Milky Way): For some reason the Quantum Teleporter teleported you to about 500 floors from the center of Milky Way. 2 big black balls are in the vincinity, and you are getting pulled --- slightly. Are you ready for the stretching?
Floor 226 (499? from the center of Milky Way): You see a space station, with some Kerbals eating booster o's in the window
Floor 227 (250 from the center of Milky Way): Looks like you might go into one of the black holes. If so, hope you can get out of here.
Floor 228: Walmart: Save money, live better
Floor 229: KERBALS, KERBALS EVERYWHERE!
Floor 300: Advanced soap development facilities.
